snippet: Considering how community members tend to commute to school and work and get around town, and working in "task forces" to develop proposals to promote physical activity.
abstract: Considering how community members tend to commute to school and work and get around town, and working in "task forces" to develop proposals to promote physical activity.

byline.original: By JENNIFER CUTRARO and HOLLY EPSTEIN OJALVO

headline.main: Walk in the Park: Encouraging Physical Activity in Communities
